text: O Nkosi yethu! Mna ndenze enye yenzala yam ukuba ihlale entilini engalinywayo, ngaseNdlwini yaKho eNgcwele (iKa’bha) khona ukuze bona Nkosi yethu bakwazi ukwenza iSalâh. Ke kaloku zalisa iintliziyo zabathile kubantu ngothando mayela nabo. Kananjalo Wena babonelele ngeziqhamo khon’ukuze banike umbulelo (kuWe)
